captions.text: Day 31: When Giant Panda Cub Yuan Zai Meets Mother Panda
Yuan Zai is 31 days old on August 6, 2013
It's a big day for her
The keeper carefully moves Yuan Zai from the incubator
into a small container
and gets ready for Yuan Zai to meet her mom, Yuan Yuan
They will interact for the first time since Yuan Zai was born
The keeper lets Yuan Yuan sniff Yuan Zai's blanket
to familiarize herself with Yuan Zai's scent
Then the keeper carefully takes Yuan Zai out
and puts Yuan Zai close to her mom
Yuan Yuan immediately pulls herself closer to Yuan Zai
and begins pacing nervously
She wants to go near Yuan Zai
Yuan Zai also seems to sense that mommy is in front of her
Even with her eyes still shut
she starts crying out loud
Yuan Yuan also makes low pitched vocalization,
a sound that our keepers have never heard from Yuan Yuan before
She also growls and scratches at the gate
Yuan Yuan looks like a loving mom
who's anxiously calling out to her daughter
Everyone on our zoo staff feels heavy hearted
and relieved at the same time
This means Yuan Zai is one step closer to returning to Yuan Yuan's side
To allow time for Yuan Yuan and Yuan Zai get used to each other
and to prevent another injury for Yuan Zai
The keepers have to execute each step toward the reunion carefully
in order to return Yuan Zai to her mom safely
To comfort the upset Yuan Yuan
the keepers gives her the panda stuffed animal
Yuan Yuan immediately grabs the toy and hold it in her arms
But she throws it away shortly after
and stares at the empty container that Yuan Zai was in
We are confident that Yuan Zai will be reunited with Yuan Yuan imminently

title: 當圓仔與圓圓相會 When Giant Panda Cub Yuan Zai Meets Mother, Yuan Yuan (English Subtitle Available)
